messages.text: Hi, I saw your ad online. Do you do roof repairs?
Hi there! Yes, we do roof repairs and replacements. My name is Sarah. What kind of issue are you experiencing?
I have a leak in my roof from the recent storm. Water is coming into my living room and I'm worried about damage.
I understand, that's urgent. We can send a roofing specialist out today to assess the damage. What's your address?
Perfect. We have availability at 2pm today or tomorrow morning at 9am. Which works better?
How much will it cost? I'm on a fixed income.
The inspection is free. After we assess the damage, we'll provide a detailed quote. Most roof repairs range from $500-$2000 depending on the extent. We also offer financing options if needed.
That seems expensive. Can you do it cheaper?
I understand your concern. We can discuss options when the specialist arrives. They can give you a detailed quote before any work begins. Would 2pm today work?
Okay, let's do 2pm today. My name is John Smith and my phone number is 602-555-1234.
Perfect! I've scheduled you for today at 2pm. The roofing specialist will call 30 minutes before arrival. See you then!
